frame.name: Adding_up
frame.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>Cognizer</fen> computes a <fen>Result</fen> on the basis of input <fen>Numbers</fen> by addition.
<ex> <t>Add</t> <t>up</t> <fex name="Numbers">your savings</fex>.</ex> <ex> This is a cumulative figure obtained by <t>adding</t> <t>up</t> <fex name="Numbers">the cost of treating a given volume of specific diseases</fex>. </ex> <ex>When <fex name="Cognizer">he</fex> later took the trouble to <t>add</t> <t>up</t> <fex name="Numbers">the bill</fex> he discovered that the actual cost was Fr 1,481 , around 140 pounds : an overcharge of 40 pounds</ex> <ex><fex name="Cognizer">Chaperones</fex> <t>tallied</t> <fex name="Numbers">the number of tickets sold at the school dance</fex> <fex name="Result">at more than 1000</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Numbers
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Numbers</fen> that are used in the calculation.</def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition: <def-root>The time at which the <fen>Cognizer</fen> operates on the <fen>Numbers</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Place
FE.definition: <def-root>The location where the <fen>Cognizer</fen> performs their calculation</def-root>

FE.name: Purpose
FE.definition: <def-root>The state-of-affairs that the <fen>Cognizer</fen> hopes to bring about by calculating.</def-root>

FE.name: Means
FE.definition:
<def-root>The action performed by the <fen>Cognizer</fen> that brings about their calculation of the <fen>Result</fen>.
</def-root>

FE.name: Manner
FE.definition:
<def-root>A holistic description of the event (e.g. "the same way"), including depictions of the <fen>Cognizer</fen> in terms of how the <fen>Cognizer</fen>'s state affects the entire action.
<ex>This week the top brass again <fex name="man">grimly</fex> <t>tallied</t> the number of dead .</ex></def-root>

lexUnit.name: tally.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: calculate the total number of
